title: minecraft.jar在哪
author: chenyuheng
txt_content: 我的minecraft.jar是个文件,怎么装mod呀

replies.txt_content:
1.5.x：.minecraft/bin/minecraft.jar
1.6.x： .minecraft/version/1.6.x/1.6.x.jar
PS:mod其实放在mods文件夹里就好了
PS:求采纳
